title: FAA updates Starship launch license for next flight
summary:
The FAA has issued an updated license for the next flight of SpaceX’s Starship vehicle, with a launch likely in the first half of January.
The post FAA updates Starship launch license for next flight appeared first on SpaceNews.

title: Hubble Spies a Cosmic Eye
summary: This NASA/ESA Hubble Space Telescope image features the spiral galaxy NGC 2566, which sits 76 million light-years away in the constellation Puppis. A prominent bar of stars stretches across the center of this galaxy, and spiral arms emerge from each end of the bar. Because NGC 2566 appears tilted from our perspective, its disk takes […]

title: Hera asteroid mission in your house
Germany Commits €95M More to Isar, RFA, and HyImpulse
summary:
The German government has announced that it will make €95 million in additional funding available to support Isar Aerospace, Rocket Factory Augsburg, and HyImpulse. On 19 December, the German government announced that the new funding would assist German rocket builders in the final phases of development ahead of the inaugural flights of their rockets. According […]

title: Sols 4398-4401: Holidays Ahead, Rocks Under the Wheels
summary: Earth planning date: Wednesday, Dec. 18, 2024 It’s almost holiday time, and preparations are going ahead on Earth and Mars! title: Next Crew Dragon mission delayed a month
summary:
Delays in the completion of a new Crew Dragon spacecraft will extend the stay of astronauts on the International Space Station by a month.
The post Next Crew Dragon mission delayed a month appeared first on SpaceNews.
